Topic.Name: Triangulation of polygons with holes
Topic.Title: Triangulation of polygons with holes
Topic.s:
This has been the main goal of this program. This task doesn't look easy on a first glance but isn't this complicated either, as it can be split up in two smaller tasks:

  1. Connecting the outer polygon with the polygon inside representing the hole and thus creating a new polygon consisting of both of them.
  2. Triangulating the new, combined polygon.

If the outer polygon contains more the one hole, just connect it with one of the holes and then connect the resulting, combined polygon with the next hole and so on.

 

This way the task has been split up in connecting nested polygons and the triangulation of one single polygon. See the linked topics on how to achieve each of the tasks.
